general.label: Licence
general.comment:
License Keys: You can find your license key on your order conformation mail or login to you account at Magmodules.eu
Need development license keys? Please go to My License Keys in our store to generate a development license key.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.tooltip: A valid license key is required in order to enable the module.

note_sitename.label: Use structured data markup on your public website to indicate the preferred name you want Google to display in Search results. You can also provide more than one possible name for your site, and let Google Search algorithms choose between them.

sitename_name.label: Sitename
sitename_name.tooltip: Fill in your official domain name.

sitename_alternate.label: Alternate Name
sitename_alternate.tooltip: Be reasonbly similar to your domain name. Be a natural name used to refer to the site, such as "Magmodules," rather than "Magmodules, Inc.". Be unique to your site and not used by some other site not be a misleading description of your site.

note_breadcumbs.label: The breadcrumb trail is a set of links (breadcrumbs) that can help a user understand and navigate your site's hierarchy, like this: Yourstore › Books › Authors › Stephen King. When you activate the Breadcrumb, Google can use it to understand and present the information on your pages in our search results.

breadcrumbs.label: Enabled
breadcrumbs.tooltip: This will overwrite your custom breadcrumbs.phtml, see our knowledgebase for more information.

breadcrumbs_markup.label: Markup
breadcrumbs_markup.tooltip: Select the markup method for the Breadcrumb, you can use the traditional Schema.org markup or the RDFa structure, more information about these markups can be found right here.

breadcrumbs_custom.label: Custom Home Title
breadcrumbs_custom.tooltip: Replace the Home breadcrumb with a cutom title.

note_organization.label: This Schema allows you to mark up the contact information on your site for your business or organization. This rich text formatting is referenced by Google Local as a source for its data.

rating.label: Shop Rating Data
rating.tooltip: Easily Connect your Shopreview data with the Rich Snippets. Whenever you don't have Shopreviews you can disable this function or use our Shopreview extension.

facebook.label: Facebook Company Link
facebook.tooltip: Enter the appropriate social media link.

twitter.label: Twitter Company Link
twitter.tooltip: Enter the appropriate social media link.

linkedin.label: Linkedin landingpage
linkedin.tooltip: Enter the appropriate social media link.

googleplus.label: Googleplus landingpage
googleplus.tooltip: Enter the appropriate Google+ link starting with +.

pinterest.label: Pinterest landingpage
pinterest.tooltip: Enter the appropriate social media link.

instagram.label: Instagram landingpage
instagram.tooltip: Enter the appropriate social media link.

note_social.label: Add your pinterest and twitter username and activate the Pinterest Rich Pins and Twitter Product Cards on product and/or cateogrie level.

pinterest_username.label: Pinterest Sitename
pinterest_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Tiwtter Cards (Product / Category) & Organization Links.

twitter_username.label: Twitter Username
twitter_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Rich Pins (product / category) & Organization Links.

facebook_username.label: Facebook Company username
facebook_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Organization Links.

linkedin_username.label: Linkedin username
linkedin_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Organization Links.

googleplus_username.label: Googleplus Username
googleplus_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Organization Links.

instagram_username.label: Instagram Username
instagram_username.tooltip: Can be used for: Organization Links.

note_sitelinkssearch.label: An improved search box within the search results. When shown, it will make it easier for users to reach specific content on your site, directly through your own site-search pages.

products.label: Product Page Configuration
products.comment: Enable the Rich Snippets on your product page to show your rich product data in Google, Yahoo and BING.

type.label: Type of display
type.tooltip: The extension makes a little summary about your product. To implement the rich snippets the best way, we recommend to show this summary markup on your productpage with JSON-LD or the visible markup. You can also choose to place the markup manually. Read more about this setting in our Knowledgebase.

location.label: Location on Productpage
location.tooltip: Select the location of the product summary. Check our Knowledge Base for a detailed description about the Manual option.

location_custom.label: Custom Location
location_custom.tooltip: Select the location of the product summary block.

position.label: Position
position.tooltip: Select if you want to show the product summary before of after the content.

location_ft.label: Location in Footer
location_ft.tooltip: Select the location of the product summary. Check our Knowledge Base for a detailed description about the Manual option.

position_ft.label: Position
position_ft.tooltip: Select the position of the product summary block.

prices.label: Price Type
prices.tooltip: Use default Magento product pricing or custom attribute. Only change this to attribute if you have overwritten the price function in Magento!

taxperc.label: Tax Percentage
taxperc.comment: When the tax percentage is 21% use 21.

price_attribute.label: Attribute
price_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute (decimal) used for pricing.

hide_noprice.label: Hide snippets if there is no price
hide_noprice.tooltip: When there isn't any price available we recommend hiding it.

stock.label: Show Stock
stock.tooltip: Display in stock or out of stock in the search results.

condition.label: Show Condition
condition.tooltip: Display in stock or out of stock in the search results.

condition_attribute.label: Condition Attribute
condition_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute (text) used for product-description.

currencies.label: Currencies
currencies.tooltip: Please select the extra currencies for display

reviews.label: Display
reviews.tooltip: Display review score (stars) in the search results.

reviews_type.label: Reviews / Votes
reviews_type.tooltip: Select if you want to show the product reviews or product votes.

reviews_metric.label: Out of
reviews_metric.tooltip: Select the rating out of 100 or out of 5 (stars).

description.label: Display
description.tooltip: Display the description of your product in search result.

description_attribute.label: Attribute
description_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute (text) used for product-description.

brand.label: Display
brand.tooltip: Display the productbrand in search results.

brand_attribute.label: Brand Attribute
brand_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute used for brand (default: Manufacturer).

color_attribute.label: Color Attribute
color_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute used for color (default: Color).

model.label: Display
model.tooltip: Display the model in the search results.

model_attribute.label: Model Attribute
model_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute used for model (default: model).

ean.label: Display
ean.tooltip: Use unique product id (EAN, UPC, ISBN, etc).

ean_attribute.label: Attribute
ean_attribute.tooltip: Select the attribute used as unique product id (default: SKU).

ean_type.label: Unique Type
ean_type.tooltip: The Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) is a 14-digit number which includes various EAN/UCC numbering structures and is used to uniquely identify a product worldwide. EAN/UCC product identification numbers allow a unique identifying GTIN number to be derived in the system. All EAN/UCC numbers are considered as 14-digit numbers, right justified and zero filled where necessary.

category.label: Category Page Configuration
category.comment:
Generate Rich Snippets for your categegory page e.g.
Our cell phones has been rated 2.4/5 based on 12 individual customer review(s).

type.label: Type of display
type.tooltip: The extension makes a little summary about your category. To implement the rich snippets the best way, we recommend to show this summary markup on your productpage with JSON-LD or the visible markup. You can also choose to use hidden tags, it's still working but it can take some more time for crawling your data.

location.label: Location on Categorypage
location.tooltip: Select if you want to manually add the code or if you want the code added automatically.

position.label: Position
position.tooltip: Select if you want to show the category summary before of after the content.

location_ft.label: Location in Footer
location_ft.tooltip: Select the location of the Rich Snippet summary.

position_ft.label: Position
position_ft.tooltip: Select if you want to show the category summary before of after the content.

prices.label: Prices
prices.tooltip: Select how you want to show your category price in your front-end and search engines.

noprice.label: Hide if no price
noprice.tooltip: Price is a recommended fields so we recommend that you don't use the rich snippets block without a price.

reviews.label: Display
reviews.tooltip: Display the description of your category in search result.

reviews_type.label: Reviews / Votes
reviews_type.tooltip: Select if you want to show the product reviews or product votes.

reviews_metric.label: Out of
reviews_metric.tooltip: Select the rating out of 100 or out of 5 (stars).

description.label: Display
description.tooltip: Display the category description in the search results.

heading_og.label: CMS Pages: Open Graph Facebook Tags

og_logo_url.label: Image Url
og_logo_url.comment: Facebook requires the logo to be at least 200px by 200px

twitter_logo_url.label: Image Url
twitter_logo_url.comment: The image must be a minimum size of 120px by 120px and must be less than 1MB in file size.
